about_the_game:
Developer's Message

Dear players,

We are very excited to announce that the early test version of our game "Cavalry Clash: Three Kingdoms Domination" is now available~! Over the past eight years, our studio has undergone development across "two generations," dedicating countless days and nights of hard work and passion to create a unique and thrilling Three Kingdoms strategy game for everyone. (Development period: September 2016 ~ December 2024; Developers: 1~3 people)

"Cavalry Charge (Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms)" is a Three Kingdoms SLG national war game evolved from graphic games to images, and it is currently the first national war SLG game on the market that strongly supports and encourages free trading among players. This game will support smartphones, tablets, and PC gameplay. (Game type: Mini-games + National War SLG)

Initially, due to limited funds, we used the simplest graphic art for light gameplay. After the team was reorganized, everyone unanimously agreed that the combination of mini-games and national war SLG represents a huge potential market, so we decided to fully commit to developing in this direction. We hope that during this passionate and vibrant youthful period, we can live up to our dreams, fight bravely, chase our dreams, strive to create brilliant achievements, and leave no regrets! The games we drew inspiration from include "Castle Siege," "Arena of Valor," "Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Strategy Edition," "Sanguosha," etc.

We highly value every player's feedback and hope you can share your feelings and suggestions with us during your gameplay. Your support is our driving force to keep moving forward and will help us continuously optimize and update game content in the future.

Once again, thank you for your attention and support for "Cavalry Clash"! We look forward to meeting you in the game and creating wonderful memories together!

Wishing you a happy gaming experience!

[Liudao Wuyu Game Studio]

Game Features

【Strategic National War】

A full-size large map with a 1:1 true replication of 379 cities from the Three Kingdoms period. Players can utilize terrain, tactics, routes, and other elements to cooperate with allies and launch brilliant campaigns, occupy strategic locations to block enemy marching routes, or deploy troops and generals to enhance defenses. Victory is determined not only by combat power but also by strategy, formation matching, emphasizing a turn-based, strategic, cooperative, and fair gaming experience, making strategic national war no longer a monotonous task of deploying troops and generals.

【High Fidelity】

Departing from the traditional Three Kingdoms game's virtual main city gameplay model, based on authentic historical maps of the Three Kingdoms, comprehensively replicating over 300 cities, more than 100 Three Kingdoms generals, over 10 siege engines, and more than 30 types of soldiers.

【Market Economy】

Our game is committed to lowering the spending threshold, allowing more players to enjoy a better gaming experience. The introduced trading system allows players to trade freely and acquire paid tokens. Additionally, the inclusion of unbound resources allows players to use and trade flexibly, enhancing the game's freedom and fun. We believe these designs will increase the game's playability and fairness, enabling every player to find their own enjoyment! (Top-up explanation: 6 yuan = 60 gold coupons, 1 gold coupon = 10 gold, gold coupons can be used as tokens to purchase direct purchase packs)

【Account Interconnection】

To enhance players' cross-platform experience, we have implemented account interconnection between the Steam international server and the TAPTAP overseas version, and also support interconnection between the Steam mainland server and domestic TAPTAP accounts. Whether you choose to play on a PC big screen or use mobile devices like smartphones, you can enjoy the game’s fun anytime, anywhere.

Gameplay

【Foreign Envoy】

Foreign Envoy is a national instance mode where only the lord of the same country can simultaneously challenge their own country's Foreign Envoy. Winning the challenge grants tribute rewards. The Foreign Envoy instance is divided into multiple levels, with higher levels being more difficult.

【Regular National War】

Players can attack ordinary cities at any time. This type of national war is intended to pave city routes for large-scale national wars and to facilitate the occupation of strategic fortress cities.

【Gold City Battle】

From 12:00-14:00 and 20:00-22:00 daily, players can attack large cities. Players can use tactics such as ambushing and barring soldiers to obstruct opponents. After conquering the city, more gold rewards will be settled during the autumn harvest each year.

【Xiangyang Battle】

All server players participate simultaneously in attacking the largest city in this game (Xiangyang). The country that remains in the main city of Xiangyang will be the hegemon when the next Xiangyang battle starts and will receive hegemon rewards.

【Bullet Screen Game & Trading Hall】

From 14:00-18:00 daily, players can play the bullet screen game "Call Me Great Sage" at the Fenge Post Station to win unbound gold coupons or gold, which can be used in the trading hall to purchase needed resources such as grain, silver, timber, pig iron, etc., from other players.

Game Base and DLC Reward Introduction

【Game Base】

  • Game character data can be shared; accounts from Steam PC and Taptap Android are linked.

  • Rewards: Non-bound gold vouchers *320, Non-bound gold *3200

  • Permanent title "Steam Player," with special effects, Claim it in the email.

  • 5 Gold Goblets for 200 consecutive draws in the Tavern Feast (Note: Worth 8000 gold)

  • Additional bonus: 1000 gold vouchers.

【Cavalry Clash - Hero Summon Pack】
Includes: Gold Goblets *10 for 400 consecutive draws in the Tavern Feast (Note: Worth 15000 gold)

【Cavalry Clash - War Resource Pack】
Includes: Marching Orders *150, Gold Recruitment Orders *125, Silver *1,000,000, Food Supplies *2,000,000, Wood *2,000,000, Iron *1,000,000 (Note: Worth 30000 gold)

Differences Between the Trial Version and the Full Game

The trial version includes the normal content of the game, but it does not include the rewards available in the full game. The details are as follows:

1.No data transfer between the trial version and the full game.

2.No additional rewards are given.

Follow Us

Player Group 1: 345365742

Player Group 2: 546361236

Bilibili: Liudao Wuyu Game Studio

Xiaohongshu: Liudao Wuyu Game Studio

Discord：Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms is a game that combines the historical theme of the Three Kingdoms with strategic elements. The game features a connected large-scale map design, supporting national wars with up to ten thousand players on the same map.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
